# [Interview #1108: WOR-Omaha, NE, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1108#22)

#### Macen

Why does Hoid show up in all of your books?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Because they're all connected and he's searching for something.
